statements: SELECT * FROM equipment_maintenance;
SELECT equipment_name, purchase_date, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment_maintenance;
SELECT equipment_name, next_maintenance_date FROM equipment_maintenance ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE last_maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_notes FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE equipment_name = 'Printer';
SELECT * FROM equipment_maintenance ORDER BY purchase_date DESC, equipment_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT equipment_name, purchase_date, next_maintenance_date FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_notes FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE maintenance_notes LIKE '%urgent%';
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date, next_maintenance_date FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE last_maintenance_date IS NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_equipment, MAX(purchase_date) AS latest_purchase_date FROM equipment_maintenance GROUP BY equipment_name ORDER BY total_equipment DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_history;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type, maintenance_description FROM maintenance_history;
SELECT maintenance_date, maintenance_type, maintenance_description, equipment_id FROM maintenance_history;
SELECT repair_type, repair_date, repair_cost FROM repair_history;
SELECT repair_description, repair_date, equipment_id, repair_type, repair_cost FROM repair_history;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_history WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_description FROM maintenance_history WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled Maintenance' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT repair_type, COUNT(*) AS total_repairs FROM repair_history GROUP BY repair_type ORDER BY total_repairs DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, repair_date, repair_cost FROM repair_history WHERE repair_cost > 500 ORDER BY repair_cost DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, repair_date, repair_description FROM repair_history WHERE repair_description LIKE '%broken%' AND repair_type = 'Emergency Repair';
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, purchase_date FROM Equipment ORDER BY purchase_date;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, maintenance_date FROM Equipment WHERE equipment_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceRecords WHERE maintenance_type = 'Routine Maintenance' AND technician_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT equipment_id, repair_date, issue_description, repair_cost FROM RepairRecords ORDER BY repair_cost DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, purchase_date FROM Equipment WHERE maintenance_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_type, technician_name FROM Equipment e JOIN MaintenanceRecords m ON e.equipment_id = m.equipment_id WHERE m.maintenance_type = 'Preventive';

SELECT e.equipment_name, r.repair_date, r.issue_description, r.repair_cost FROM Equipment e JOIN RepairRecords r ON e.equipment_id = r.equipment_id WHERE r.repair_cost > 1000 ORDER BY r.repair_cost DESC;
SELECT m.technician_name, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM MaintenanceRecords m GROUP BY m.technician_name HAVING total_records > 5;
SELECT e.equipment_name, m.maintenance_date AS last_maintenance FROM Equipment e JOIN MaintenanceRecords m ON e.equipment_id = m.equipment_id GROUP BY e.equipment_name ORDER BY last_maintenance DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, purchase_date FROM equipment ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment WHERE last_maintenance_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_date, maintenance_details FROM equipment JOIN maintenance_records ON equipment.equipment_id = maintenance_records.equipment_id ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, purchase_date FROM equipment WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;

SELECT equipment_name, repair_date, technician_name FROM equipment e JOIN maintenance_records mr ON e.equipment_id = mr.equipment_id JOIN repair_history rh ON mr.record_id = rh.record_id JOIN technicians t ON rh.technician_id = t.technician_id;
SELECT equipment_name, purchase_date, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment ORDER BY last_maintenance_date ASC, purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_type, purchase_date FROM Equipment WHERE maintenance_status = TRUE;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_type, purchase_date FROM Equipment ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_type FROM Equipment WHERE equipment_type LIKE 'Computer%';
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE maintenance_type = 'Inspection' ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Equipment WHERE purchase_date >= '2021-01-01' AND maintenance_status = TRUE;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_type FROM Equipment WHERE maintenance_status = FALSE ORDER BY equipment_type ASC;
SELECT log_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2021-06-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT repair_id, repair_type FROM Repairs WHERE repair_date >= '2022-01-01' AND repair_type = 'Electrical' ORDER BY repair_date ASC;
SELECT technician_name, technician_specialty FROM Technicians WHERE technician_specialty = 'Electronics' OR technician_specialty = 'Mechanical' ORDER BY technician_name ASC;
